title: Why Ban because of saltyness
body:
I am banned for 14 days because i was salty...if im salty it does not mean anything that i will need to be banned...and that will make everyone that is banned like this more angry.....i think you should not ban people because they are salty...ban them because of their behavior,afk,rage-afk,feed...all that kind of stuff...but if someone rages do not ban him/her for nothing just because we are all babies crying
{{champion:157}} main in here!

replies.body: The vast majority of players have the minute amount of self control required to be decent human beings, even  when annoyed in the game.  We don't need to make exceptions for those who don't.
